description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Toulouse vs Montpellier in the Ligue 1
title: Toulouse vs Montpellier: Ligue 1 stats & head-to-head
title_page: Toulouse vs Montpellier: Ligue 1 stats & head-to-head - BBC Sport
maintext:
Post
Attempt blocked. Yann Gboho (Toulouse) right footed shot from the left side of the box is blocked. Assisted by Cristian Cásseres.
Post
Fourth official has announced 4 minutes of added time.
Post
Attempt saved. Zakaria Aboukhlal (Toulouse) header from the centre of the box is saved in the top centre of the goal. Assisted by Rafik Messali with a cross.
Goal!
Goal! Toulouse 1, Montpellier 2. Othmane Maamma (Montpellier) header from the centre of the box to the bottom left corner. Assisted by Téji Savanier with a cross.
Post
Zakaria Aboukhlal (Toulouse) wins a free kick on the right wing.
Post
Attempt missed. Zakaria Aboukhlal (Toulouse) header from very close range misses to the right. Assisted by Cristian Cásseres with a cross.
